entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 4 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
